tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE space_missions (
    mission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(100),
    launch_date TIMESTAMP,
    destination VARCHAR(200),
    mission_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SpaceMissions (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255),
    launch_date DATE,
    launch_site VARCHAR(255),
    destination VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE MissionTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id INT,
    task_title VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_due_date DATE,
    task_status VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE mission_schedule (mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mission_name VARCHAR(255), launch_date DATE, arrival_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE mission_crew (crew_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mission_id INT, crew_name VARCHAR(255), role VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE launch_site (site_id INT PRIMARY KEY, site_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE spacecraft (craft_id INT PRIMARY KEY, craft_name VARCHAR(255), mission_id INT, status VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE mission_tasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mission_id INT, task_description TEXT, task_status VARCHAR(50));
